preqs: Students must be enrolled in course 0181, 0171 or 4416 to undertake this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0171, 0181, 4416, B6003}
Unit was previously coded {AFF4011, AFF4015%, AFX4080%, BFX4080}

description: This unit draws on the academic literature to provide a study of a range of topics relating to banking and finance.  It presents a basis for students intending to undertake research into banking and related finance questions.  Topics covered include theory of financial intermediation, risk management, efficiency assessment, competition modelling and bank regulation.
